key_work.title: Natalie Kalmus
key_work.brief_description: When studios hired Technicolor cameras and equipment, they also hired Natalie Kalmus. During the glory days of Technicolor’s three-strip process, between 1934 and 1955, she was the colour supervisor on over 400 films, including The Wizard of Oz (1939).
